INSERT INTO AUDIT_EVENTS (ID, NAME, TIMESTAMP , TYPE, SUBJECT_ID, INITIATOR_ID, ACTION, CONTENTS) VALUES (#{id}, #{timestamp}, #{type}, #{subjectId}, #{initiatorId}, #{action}, #{contents})
mapper.sql: SELECT E.ID, E.NAME, E.TIMESTAMP, E.TYPE, E.ACTION, E.CONTENTS, S.ID AS SUBJECT_ID, S.ENTITY_ID AS SUBJECT_ENTITY_ID, S.NAME AS SUBJECT_NAME, S.EMAIL AS SUBJECT_EMAIL, I.ID AS INITIATOR_ID, I.ENTITY_ID AS INITIATOR_ENTITY_ID, I.NAME AS INITIATOR_NAME, I.EMAIL AS INITIATOR_EMAIL, AT.TAG AS TAG FROM AUDIT_EVENTS AS E LEFT JOIN AUDIT_ENTITIES AS S ON E.SUBJECT_ID = S.ID LEFT JOIN AUDIT_ENTITIES AS I ON E.INITIATOR_ID = I.ID LEFT JOIN AUDIT_EVENTS_TAGS AET ON E.ID = AET.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN AUDIT_TAGS AT ON AET.TAG_ID = AT.ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUDIT_ENTITIES (ENTITY_ID, NAME, EMAIL) VALUES (#{entityId}, #{name}, #{email})
INSERT INTO AUDIT_TAGS SELECT NULL,#{tag} FROM AUDIT_TAGS WHERE ID=(SELECT MAX(ID) from AUDIT_TAGS) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM AUDIT_TAGS WHERE TAG=#{tag})
